metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: HTML tables can have headers for each column or row, or for many columns/rows.
content.html: HTML tables can have headers for each column or row, or for many columns/rows.

content.text: Table headers are defined with th elements. Each th element represents a table cell.
content.html: Table headers are defined with th elements. Each th element represents a table cell.

content.code_html:
<table>
  <tr>
    <th>Firstname</th>
    <th>Lastname</th>
    <th>Age</th>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Jill</td>
    <td>Smith</td>
    <td>50</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Eve</td>
    <td>Jackson</td>
    <td>94</td>
  </tr>
</table>

content.text: To use the first column as table headers, define the first cell in each row as a <th> element:
content.html: To use the first column as table headers, define the first cell in each row as a <th> element:

content.code_html:
<table>
  <tr>
    <th>Firstname</th>
    <td>Jill</td>
    <td>Eve</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>Lastname</th>
    <td>Smith</td>
    <td>Jackson</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>Age</th>
    <td>94</td>
    <td>50</td>
  </tr>
</table>

content.text: By default, table headers are bold and centered:
content.html: By default, table headers are bold and centered:

content.text: To left-align the table headers, use the CSS text-align property:
content.html: To left-align the table headers, use the CSS text-align property:

content.code_html:
th {
  text-align: left;
}

content.text: You can have a header that spans over two or more columns.
content.html: You can have a header that spans over two or more columns.

content.text: To do this, use the colspan attribute on the <th> element:
content.html: To do this, use the colspan attribute on the <th> element:

content.code_html:
<table>
  <tr>
    <th colspan="2">Name</th>
    <th>Age</th>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Jill</td>
    <td>Smith</td>
    <td>50</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Eve</td>
    <td>Jackson</td>
    <td>94</td>
  </tr>
</table>

content.text: You will learn more about colspan and rowspan in the Table colspan & rowspan chapter.
content.html: You will learn more about colspan and rowspan in the Table colspan & rowspan chapter.

content.text: You can add a caption that serves as a heading for the entire table.
content.html: You can add a caption that serves as a heading for the entire table.

content.text: To add a caption to a table, use the <caption> tag:
content.html: To add a caption to a table, use the <caption> tag:

content.code_html:
<table style="width:100%">
  <caption>Monthly savings</caption>
  <tr>
    <th>Month</th>
    <th>Savings</th>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>January</td>
    <td>$100</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>February</td>
    <td>$50</td>
  </tr>
</table>

content.text: Note: The <caption> tag should be inserted immediately after the <table> tag.
content.html: Note: The <caption> tag should be inserted immediately after the <table> tag.

content.text: Exercise ? What is this? Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page
What is the correct tag name for a table-header in HTML?
content.html: What is the correct tag name for a table-header in HTML?

metadata.question: What is the correct tag name for a table-header in HTML?
